entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. Your call may be recorded for quality assurance. How can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I want to return this VeloBand Pulse I bought. It's not working out for me.
I understand. I can certainly help you with a return. Can I get your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
It's under john.doe@email.com. And hurry up, I don't have all day.
Thank you, one moment while I pull up your order... Okay, I see the VeloBand Pulse you purchased on July 18th. Is there a specific reason for the return?
It just doesn't track my heart rate accurately. I specifically bought the VeloBand Pulse for that reason! It's useless to me.

I apologize that the VeloBand Pulse is not meeting your expectations. Our standard return policy allows for returns within 90 days of purchase for a full refund. Let me start the return process for you.
90 days? Okay, good. Some other company gave me a hard time and only had 30 days. This is more reasonable.

Yes, with VeloFit, we want you to be completely satisfied. I've initiated the return. You'll receive a prepaid shipping label to your email address, john.doe@email.com, within the next 24 hours. Just pack the VeloBand Pulse securely in its original packaging if possible, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location.
So, just to be clear, I send it back, and then I get my money back? How long does that take?

Correct. Once we receive the returned VeloBand Pulse, we will process your refund. It typically takes 7-10 business days for the refund to appear on your original payment method. You'll receive an email notification once the refund has been processed.
Okay, that sounds good. I was worried I'd be stuck with this useless smart watch. Does this 90-day return policy apply to everything you sell?

Our standard return policy is 90 days, yes. However, certain items, like the VeloBand Pulse, may have specific return windows. But I've already approved your return, so you're all set. Do you have any other questions or concerns I can address for you today?
No, I think that's it. Thanks for your help. You were much more helpful than I expected. I was about to ask to speak to a manager, but you handled it perfectly.
You're very welcome! We appreciate your business. Have a great day!
